CAMPAIGN_NAME: Trace metals in zooplankton from Fram Strait and Greenland Sea - ARK IX/Ib cruise
CAMPAIGN_COMMENT: Cruise ARK IX/Ib of RV 'Polarstern' to the Fram Strait and the Greenland Sea in March and April 1993. Samples collected mainly along transects on 24 stations at 79°N and 75°N. Zooplankton collected with vertically towed bongo net from about 1500 m depth to surface and oblique rectangular midwater trawl (RMT 1 + 8) from 1000 m depth to surface. Both coordinates and and sampling dates are reported with only rough precision.
